message.content:
When you were 6 years old, your sister's age would have been:

(Your age at that time) - (Half of her age at that time)

6 - (1/2 * 6) = 0 (rounded down to the nearest whole number)

So when you were 6 years old, your sister was 0 years old. Now, let's calculate how old she is now:

(Your age now) - (Half of her age at that time) + (Her age at that time)

80 - (1/2 * 0) + 0 = 80 (since your sister's age has not changed since then)

So your sister is 80 years old now.
